content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'covid19moderndw_covid19dtywy3evjk25c_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [covid19moderndw_covid19dtywy3evjk25c_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://covid19moderndw@covid19dtywy3evjk25c.dfs.core.windows.net', 
		TYPE = HADOOP 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE stg.onprem_country_stg (
	[CountryName] nvarchar(4000),
	[CountryCode] nvarchar(4000),
	[Longitude] float,
	[Latitude] float
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'dboCountryonprem.txt',
	DATA_SOURCE = [covid19moderndw_covid19dtywy3evjk25c_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM stg.onprem_country_stg
GO
